subject: Upcoming eclipse on December 20-21, 2010 (think those are the correct dates)
author: Country
full_text:
Cheers to all,

Has anyone notice any type of increase of activity just before, during, and after an eclipse? Do you get better quality or more evp's during those times or is there no change? If so, what is the "window of opportunity" for using an eclipse for get paranormal activity, be it video, radio, digital recorders, etc. for the eclipse (3 days before, 3 days after, etc.)?

Does an eclipse influence paranormal activity during those times? Any insight would greatly be appreciated.

CB
